snippet.title: M.A.S.S. Builder Short Trailer
snippet.description:
M.A.S.S. Builder short trailer without commentaries. 
Please support and help us finish the game!

M.A.S.S. Builder pits citizens of the world against invading aliens that have destroyed great amount of Earth. You will build, customize, and control the ultimate M.A.S.S. (Mechanical Assault Skeleton Suit) that will eventually save the world, or at least, have fun creating and customizing your perfect mechanical suits. The game is designed to be played on the PC Platform.

follow and support us at:
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/m-a-s-s-builder-game
https://www.facebook.com/VermillionDev/
https://twitter.com/VermillionDev

Song Used:
Enter the Party by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
Source: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1100240
Artist: http://incompetech.com/
